items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

items.title: Commercial Van
items.description: Also known as cargo tires, commercial van tires feature a C at the end of the tire's size and are built with durable, long-lasting materials to help drivers as they haul packages in pickup and delivery applications.

items.title: Winter
items.description: For snow, ice, and freezing temperatures

content.body:
### Shop 295/70R18 Tire Size
The 295/70R18 tires are most commonly seen on light trucks and SUVs, and are available in various categories such as All-Terrain, Mud-Terrain, Commercial Van, All-Weather, and All-Season. 295/70R18 sized tires are most commonly used as plus size tires on popular light trucks like the Chevrolet Silverado 2500 HD, Chevrolet Silverado 3500 HD, Ford F-250, Ford F-350, GMC Sierra 2500HD, GMC Sierra 3500HD, Ram 1500 and Ram 2500.

All-terrain tires offer traction in both on- and off-road conditions, and are mostly preferred by light truck and SUV drivers as they are able to perform on both tough terrains as well as the highways. Take a look at [Falken Wildpeak A/T3W](https://simpletire.com/brands/falken-tires/wildpeak-a-t3w#v=1&tireSize=lt295-70r18&mpn=28037327&pageSource=sizeCatalog&itemId=177787&curationSeq=1&curationPos=1&curationSource=top-pick-top-picks&pick=sponsored-brands), Yokohama Geolander AT G015, or the Nitto Terra Grappler G2 if you need a 295/70R18 sized all-terrain tire that’s made to offer great performance on- and off-the-road.

Mud-terrain tires provide traction on off-road terrains like mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rocks. These tires are commonly used on SUVs, light trucks, CUVs, and jeeps. Have a look at the [Yokohama Geolander M/T G003](https://simpletire.com/tire-sizes/295-70r18?sort=bestMatch&category=6#Geolandar-M/T-G003__2), Kumho Road Venture MT71, and General Grabber X3 if you need a 295/70R18 sized mud-terrain tire.

Whether you need an all-terrain, mud-terrain, or any other type of tire for your Ford F-350, Chevy Silverado 3500 HD, Ram 2500, or any other light truck, SimpleTire has a wide range of 295/70R18 sized tires that meet your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
